Bloodgrass.effect: Can combine with any other Potion Effect ingredient to become food for 1 day.

Primordial Balm.effect: Doubles effect of potion or poison.

Chromus Slime.effect: The final effect after all other calculations is the exact opposite.

Dried Ephedra.effect: Increase the dice-type by 1 size for any healing Effect.

Fennel Silk.effect: Stabilizes body heat to resist cold weather or wet condition penalties for 1 hour.

Gengko Brush.effect: Double the dice rolled of any healing Effect, but divide the total of the dice by 2 (rounding down).

Lavender Sprig.effect: Makes the potion or toxin more stable and safer to craft.

Wyrmtongue Petals.effect: 1d4 + Alchemy Modifier poison damage per round; target is poisoned for 1 minute.

Amanita Cap.effect: Changes any poison Effect to be non-lethal and only incapacitates the target.

Arctic Creeper.effect: Change poison damage to cold or necrotic damage; still considered poison for crafting.

Cactus Juice.effect: Delays poison damage by 5 rounds before taking effect.

Hydrathistle.effect: Used to create potions of Water Breathing.

Fiends Ivy.effect: Used to create potions of Mind Reading.

Voidroot.effect: Used to create potions of Flying.

Emetic Wax.effect: Delays the effect of an ingredient this was combined with by 1d6 rounds.

Hyancinth Nectar.effect: Removes 1d6 rounds of poison in the target’s system, but cannot remove it completely.

Mandrake Root.effect: Reduces any disease or poison’s potency by half for 2d12 hours. Only hinders already existing poisons or diseases in the body.

Milkweed Seeds.effect: Double the dice rolled of any healing effect, but remove all Alchemy Modifier bonuses. This modifier can stack.

Arrow Root.effect: +1 to attack rolls for one minute when applied to a weapon.

Blue Toadshade.effect: User creates a potion of gaseous form.

Cosmos Glond.effect: User creates a potion of clairvoyance.

Devil\u2019s Bloodleaf.effect: User creates a potion of vitality.

Elemental Water.effect: Required as the base catalyst for all Enchantment ingredients.

Ironwood Heart.effect: User creates a potion of growth.

Luminous Cap Dust.effect: User creates a potion of heroism.

Mortflesh Powder.effect: User creates a potion of longevity.

Nightshade Berries.effect: The effect of this 'potion' is similar to the oil of slipperiness.

Rock Vine.effect: User creates a potion of invulnerability.

Scillia Beans.effect: User creates a potion of climbing.

Silver Hibiscus.effect: When consumed, the user can unleash a random elemental breath weapon 3 times.

Tail Leaf.effect: User creates a potion of speed.

Verdant Nettle.effect: User creates a potion of animal friendship.

Wrackwort Bulbs.effect: User creates a potion of diminution.
